body: Hey all. I know it's close to the deadline for Pongchamps, but Sophia just wrapped up one of her customer research experiments, and based on the results we think our marketing strategy needs to be changed up a bit. While I know it's not yet implemented, the player character customization was a massive hit. Any chance one of you could quickly swap out the player character with a new one and send me a build of the game so that I can take a quick video? I think it will make the game's trailer much more impactful to have this.
@Andrew is this something you can take care of? I have my hands full right now.
Yeah, I can recolor the player as red or blue maybe if that works? Or do you need it to be an entirely new player character?
Sorry if this is a dumb question, but how long would it take you to do a recolor vs an entirely new character assuming Quinn has one handy?

If Quinn has one handy then both will likely take an equal amount of time. If Quinn doesn't have one handy, it would take quite a bit of time and effort to make an entirely new character and get it into the game.
Cool cool, will check with Quinn and then let you know.
Just checked with Quinn, she's got one that she's sending it over to you. Thank you for doing this!
